category-def.name: de.hub.clickwatch
category-def.label: ClickWatch
category-def.description: ClickWatch allows to visualize the configuration of network-protocol implementations build with MIT's framework Click. The building blocks of network-protocols written in Click are Elements. Elements have parameters that can be read and written via handlers. ClickWatch is an EMF-based eclipse GUI that collects Click element data from configured nodes in a given network. ClickWatch allows to watch handlers of the running network-protocol elements to debug the network-protocol.
